reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars VILVA Portable Monitor has become an essential part of my tech setup
reviews.reviewText: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐I am absolutely thrilled with my VILVA Portable Monitor! This 15.6'' 1080P FHD IPS Display has exceeded all my expectations and added incredible convenience to my daily routine.The sleek design and slim profile make it ultra-portable, allowing me to take my work and entertainment anywhere I go. The combination of USB-C and HDMI connectivity options ensures compatibility with various devices, making it incredibly versatile.The image quality is stunning, with vibrant colors and sharp details that enhance both work and entertainment experiences. The 1080P resolution provides a crisp and clear display, making it a joy to watch movies, edit photos, or work on spreadsheets.Setting up the monitor was a breeze – simply plug and play! The responsiveness is impressive, and I appreciate the user-friendly interface. The ability to power the monitor through USB-C is a game-changer, reducing cable clutter and simplifying my workspace.Additionally, the durability of the monitor gives me confidence in its longevity. The build quality is excellent, and the protective case included ensures that it stays in pristine condition during travel.In summary, the VILVA Portable Monitor has become an essential part of my tech setup. It combines style, functionality, and portability seamlessly, making it a must-have for anyone in need of an additional screen on the go. I highly recommend this monitor to anyone looking for a top-notch portable display solution!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice monitor for the price
reviews.reviewText: This is an extremely nice monitor for the price! I was wary given the usual "too good to be true" since many other portable monitors are considerably more expensive, but this monitor is wonderful so I'll start from the beginning:First, its packaged very nicely. It comes in a very sturdy box with plenty of protective foam, and a protective sleeve on the monitor. It comes with a basic magnetic stand that is a little flimsy, but there was also an enclosed card for one free upgrades accessory, of which a better stand it one of them. It comes with a type c to type c cord and a type c to hdmi cord. I am using this with a Google Pixelbook and it works great. Just make sure you have the plug inserted all the way (its a little tight so you gotta make sure you give it a little extra push) otherwise the screen will go in and out.Setup was super easy. Literally just plug the cord into the monitor and your laptop and you're golden.The monitor itself is nice resolution. Is it "omg this is the best picture ever!" good? No, but its still really good and actually better than the regular ASUS monitors I have set up at my desk for wfh.Overall, this portable monitor is a fantastic value and I'd highly recommend you purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid and Affordable Panel, Great for Productivity on the Go
reviews.reviewText: For under $80, this monitor is quite well built and is highly versatile! Especially for someone whose been mandated to return to an in-office presence, the added option of being able to go anywhere with a second screen is handy. While it won't curb the soul-crushing commute, this monitor has replicated at least a little bit of the void of my home setup. All in all, pretty fantastic for the price.Pros:Packaged well and the screen is very quick to setup. It has a solid IPS panel with pretty good colors and I really like that it can be powered through USB-C. It comes with an HDMI to mini-HDMI adapter as well as a traditional charger (also USB-C) based so there's really no shortage of necessary cables.Cons:The little screen cover/makeshift stand can be a little wonky, so make you plop it down on a surface with some grip. Monitor brightness also seems to default to 20 every time I power it through my laptop's USB-C port, so it's a little cumbersome to have to manually crank it every time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, great value for the price, awesome for travel
reviews.reviewText: I work a fully remote job and purchased this portable monitor primarily to use when I travel. We often visit my in-laws for extended periods of time and this monitor is extremely lightweight and portable. Very easy to use and is the same size as my work laptop. It comes with a magnetic protective cover that also serves as a little stand to prop it up. I have even used this when I want to work from a different area of my house--I have two monitors in my office but sometimes need a change of scenery. The quality of the monitor is perfect for what I use it for. As far as I can tell it is quite durable as well; when I travel it often gets shoved in my backpack with various other items and I haven't had any issues. Overall I would recommend for anyone who works remotely and travels.

Good for the price point! Was incredibly easy to set up, has all the necessary parts. The screen is only 1080p, I'm not sure how much I would enjoy gaming on it. But I believe it is excellent for work. I love how light and portable it is, I can imagine taking this with me if I'm ever doing remote work or heading to a co-working space.

reviews.reviewerName: Amazon カスタマーAmazon カスタマー
reviews.reviewText: 車の後部座席用として購入しました。ミニバンからSUVになってリアモニターが無く困るから、モバイルモニターを設置しiPadやアンドロイドスマホならそのまま動画など見れます。とても高級感ある商品でした。ケーブル類も太くて頑丈な物でした。後部座席でゲームを遊んだり子供楽しそう。

I travelled from Australia to Canada and had this delivered overnight to the hotel so I could use it for work while travelling. Am very happy with the quality. You do need to remember to turn up the brightness every time you connect it as it defaults back to 10 (I assume this is to reduce power use when the computer is running on battery) . Has been a life saver. Light weight while still a good screen size.

I am extremely happy with this portable monitor. It is well made, and it is simple to use, just plug and play. Instructions were clear, and customer service is wonderful. They added my 2 year warranty right away just hours after I sent them the email, and also responded right away to further inquiries about the offered premium accessories ( which unfortunately they can't ship to Canada, but instead gave me gift cards for Amazon to purchase the accessory myself, which worked out great.)Highly recommend this portable monitor to anyone needing a second monitor to make their work life/ school life easier.
